question: Small businesses that were able to ______ swiftly to the pandemic are more likely to overcome the crisis. They could change the business models and reduce costs.
The forest trail to the lake is perfectly ______ for people of all ages. That is why it is so popular.
I am favorably ______ by the student’s willingness to help clean the toilet. She stood out as a reliable leader.
To attract a wider ______, the theater plans to offer musical shows of different languages.
On a biological level, the main difference between bacteria and viruses is that the former can live inside or outside a body, while the latter needs a host to ______.
A potential alcoholic should be cognizant of the danger signal that he or she uses alcohol in an ______ to tackle mental problems.
If a wound remains open and has a risk of infection, then it should be ______, stapled, or closed with skin adhesives within 6 to 8 hours.
If you want to check where your package is, you can make use of the postal tracking number to monitor the movement of the ______.
Under the quarantine protocols, travelers visiting Taiwan will be ______ to a room for 14 days.
When she found a hair in her pasta, she frowned in ______ and requested a refund for her food.
Our project has a(n) ______ start as we have received financial support from a generous donor since day one.
I was overwhelmed by a sense of ______ when I found that I lost my passport and personal belongings at the airport.
Unable to answer the journalist’s embarrassing question, the pop singer paused and ______ for the right words.
Some online sources are ______. Readers should make certain that they are correct before passing the information forward.
The conflict between the two countries suddenly ______, and the neighboring countries worried that wars might be inevitable.
To encourage more people to receive vaccines, the government uses cash as ______, so whoever has vaccine injection gets $1000.
Imposing economic ______ on a country is often considered one of the serious measures of punishment.
A ______ syllabus means that changes of course content will be expected according to students’ performance and needs.
Climate change impacts the environment adversely. Many regions have been experiencing drastic effects which are ______ in forms including floods and record heat waves.
In the meeting, both parties were ______ about their proposals. Neither was willing to compromise.
World leaders pledged to strongly condemn and ______ oppose terrorism in any form and vowed to maintain world peace and stability.
The refugees were forced to leave their motherland, which was ______ by long-running war, and settled down on foreign soil.
While some people argue faith and reason are not in conflict and that the two are actually compatible, others find it difficult to ______ science and religion.
Heavy truck drivers are experts at dealing with solitude and ______ on the road. Music and audio books are their common solutions to fighting boredom.
He tripped and landed hard onto a rocky surface. He couldn’t help screaming in ______ as the pain seared through his broken leg.
Investors are advised to buy gold or make some overseas investments in case of rising ______ in their own country.
At the thought of the mistreatment he had suffered, he clenched his fists so hard that his ______ turned white.
He is the only breadwinner of his family. The heavy burden has gradually worn away his ______ ambition of becoming a world-famous violinist.
He cheered and rooted for his favorite baseball team throughout the game. When he returned home, he found his voice ______ from shouting.
One advantage of the hotel is that it offers ______ free parking near the night market in the downtown area.
When Jeffery doesn’t feel like cooking, he often orders pizza online and has it ______ to his house.
Jane is the best ______ I have ever had. I cannot imagine running my office without her help.
The temple celebrated Mazu Festival by hosting ten days of lion dances, Taiwanese operas, and traditional hand ______ shows.
The new vaccine was banned by the Food and Drug Administration due to its fatal side effects.
______ the photos with dates and keywords help you sort them easily in your file.
An ______ person is usually pleasant and easy to get along with, but don’t expect that he or she will always say “yes” to everything.
Hidden deep in a small alley among various tiny shops, the entrance of the Michelin star restaurant is barely ______ to passersby.
The original budget for my round-island trip was NT$5,000, but the ______ cost is likely to be 50 percent higher.
After watching a TV program on natural history, Adam decided to go on a ______ for dinosaur fossils in South Dakota.
With pink cherry blossoms blooming everywhere, the valley ______ like a young bride under the bright spring sunshine.
